EmailTemplate.description: Email to be sent to applicant after submission, when pending payment is still due 24 hrs later
EmailTemplate.name: REG: Payment Still Pending
EmailTemplate.subject: {!License_Registration__c.Legal_Entity_Name__c} {!License_Registration__c.Record_Type_Name__c} Application {!License_Registration__c.License_Registration_Number__c} Payment Still Pending
